bug.author: JimmyWhitaker
bug.description: Error: ENOENT: no such file or directory, mkdir '/usr/local/lib/node_modules/deepforge/s rc/worker/tmp' at Error (native) at Object.fs.mkdirSync (fs.js:916:18) at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/webgme/src/server/middleware/e xecutor/worker/node_worker.js:221:20 at next (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/webgme/src/server/middle ware/executor/worker/node_modules/rimraf/rimraf.js:74:7) at CB (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/webgme/src/server/middlewa re/executor/worker/node_modules/rimraf/rimraf.js:110:9) at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/webgme/src/server/middleware/e xecutor/worker/node_modules/rimraf/rimraf.js:136:14 at FSReqWrap.oncomplete (fs.js:117:15) 2016-08-09T15:26:16.841Z - info: [gme:serv

comments.comment: worker should have a (configurable) tmp dir in ~/.deepforge/worker/tmp
